# Module Agent Forge

Creates and registers module agents across projects with workflow and template validation.

## Instructions
See: `_bmad/module-agents/agents/module-agent-forge.md`

## Model
gpt-4o

## Tools
create_file, read_file, list_dir, file_search, grep_search, semantic_search, replace_string_in_file, multi_replace_string_in_file, list_code_usages, get_errors
